item.title: When Temps Plunge, Dilapidated Jails and Prisons Put Lives at Risk
item.description: The Marshall Project examined reports of scarce food and water and interrupted access to medical care during a day-long power outage in Mississippi.

item.title: ‘Why Is This Happening to Us?’ Daily Number of Kids in ICE Detention Jumps 6x Under Trump
item.description: As the Trump administration detains large numbers of kids, advocates worry ‘it’s only a matter of time before we see a child die.’

item.title: A Diverse Boomtown in Trump Country Says ‘Thanks, But No Thanks’ to ICE
item.description: In Springdale, Arkansas, immigrants drive growth. Local leaders worry cooperating with federal immigration raids endangers community trust.
